trends.title: RBI Mandates Stricter KYC for Digital Lenders
trends.summary: The Reserve Bank of India has announced comprehensive new KYC requirements affecting over 500 fintech lenders across India. Companies must achieve full compliance within 90 days or face regulatory penalties.

source_articles.title: Fintech Lenders Rush to Hire Compliance Heads After RBI Circular
RegTech Startups See 3x Demand as RBI KYC Deadline Looms
RBI Tightens KYC: NBFCs Must Submit Compliance Plans by March
RBI Governor Warns on KYC Compliance Gaps at Digital Lenders

impact.pitch_angle: Expert insights on RBI Mandates Stricter KYC for Digital Lenders...

trends.title: Zepto Raises $200M at $5B Valuation
trends.summary: Quick commerce startup Zepto has closed a massive $200 million funding round, valuing the company at $5 billion. The funds will be used to expand dark store network to 50 new cities.

source_articles.title: Dark Store Landlords Demand 40% Premium as Quick Commerce Expands
Quick Commerce Giants Locked in Price War on Grocery Margins
Zepto Plans 50 New Cities, Challenging Blinkit and Instamart

impact.pitch_angle: Expert insights on Zepto Raises $200M at $5B Valuation...
